bibl.title: Third Corinthians: Reclaiming Paul for Christian Orthodoxy.
bibl.note: Diss. Fordham Univ. Summary in DA 59 (1998-1999) p. 520-A. - The second chapter discusses the textual variations among the manuscripts of 3 Cor and demonstrates that the Greek text in P. Bodmer X is the closest to the original.
bibl.seg: HOVHANESSIAN Vahan A., Third Corinthians: Reclaiming Paul for Christian Orthodoxy.

Diss. Fordham Univ. Summary in DA 59 (1998-1999) p. 520-A. - The second chapter discusses the textual variations among the manuscripts of 3 Cor and demonstrates that the Greek text in P. Bodmer X is the closest to the original.
